document.discussion_title: VIEDA Notice of Governing Board Meeting | St. Thomas Source
document.topic_text: VIEDA Notice of Governing Board Meeting August 12, 2016 NOTICE OF GOVERNING BOARD MEETINGS All interested persons are hereby notified that in accordance with Section 254 Chapter 15 of Title 1, Virgin Islands Code, as amended, the decision meeting by the V.I. Economic Development Commission (“VIEDC”) will be held at 9 a.m. on Thursday, August 25, 2016 for deliberation on application matters concerning VIEDC Beneficiaries which will be brought to the Governing Board for action . The VIEDC will also hold a decision meeting to resolve compliance matters for beneficiaries of the economic development program. The V.I. Economic Development Commission is a subsidiary entity of the U.S. Virgin Islands Economic Development Authority (USVIEDA). These meetings will be held in the USVIEDA office at 8000 Nisky Shopping Center, Suite No. 620, St. Thomas, U.S. Virgin Islands and via video conference feed at the William D. Roebuck Industrial Park, No. 4 Negro Bay, Building No. 2, Frederiksted, St. Croix, VI. Please be advised that the USVIEDA Board of Directors and its subsidiary Board(s) may go into executive session with respect to any decision at any time during the meetings as provided in 1 V.I.C. § 254. For more information, contact the USVIEDA at the following: Frederiksted, St. Croix, VI 00840
